attributes.action: Prevent the privatisation and sale of Channel 4.
attributes.additional_details: Channel 4 has supported independent production for the last 4 decades. It is in the public interest to prevent the sale of Channel 4 to private ownership.
attributes.background: Prevent the sale of Channel 4 to private ownership or at the very least hold a public consultation.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/613995
